title: The Grinch Rides Again: Mary Gaitskill
description:
This week, a story for everyone who might feel just a little grinchy around the holidays. This episode is hosted by Moth Producer Michelle Jalowski.

Hosted by: Michelle Jalowski

Storyteller: Mary Gaitskill
itunes:subtitle: Mary Gaitskill decides to become someone entirely unexpected...The Grinch.
itunes:author: The Moth
